text.p: Secondhand tonnage brokers reported the sale of the following vessels.
BULKERS - Agia Methodia - (built 1975) 18.037 dwt sold for $1.3 million to Chinese buyers.
Ionian Sky - (built 1978) 23,308 dwt sold for $1.7 million to Greek buyers.
CONTAINERS - California Ceres - (built 1981) 28,615 dwt sold for $12.5 million.
TANKERS - Sukhumi - (built 1975) 22,150 dwt sold to Greek buyers for $2.3 million.
TWEENDECKERS - Cordillera - (built 1977) 10,480 dwt sold for $4.3 million.
Meng Kiat - (built 1979) 11,644 dwt sold for $4 million to undisclosed buyers.
SOLD FOR DEMOLITION - United Pioneer - (built 1969) 12,000 dwt sold for $207 delivery India.
Luck - (built 1972) 22,592 dwt sold for $192 delivery India.
Some of these sales may not be final as they may be subject to inspection, survey or other conditions.
